concept.deftn: The partnership between the entities responsible for the intellectual content of the resource.

outline.deftn: all contributors to the intellectual content of the resource were UCAR employees at the time it was created
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees and representatives from a university
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees and representatives from a non-university institution
contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees, representatives from a university, and representatives from a non-university institution
either no contributors to the intellectual content were UCAR employees, or the work associated with the resource was done when a UCAR author was at an institution other than UCAR

bestPractices.practice: Review acknowledgements and other supplementary sections of a resource to help complete this field.
